Title: American imperialism is the most fiendish enemy of world peace!
Designer: Zhou Anqi (周安琪)Yuan Jiqing (袁继清)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Caricature of Eisenhower, President of the United States when this poster was published.On his suitcase are the characters 备战 (warmongering), on the bomb 侵略 (invasion).
